data.comment: The match has started.
Monaco push upfield but Jeremy Stinat quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 7, Monaco to take a throw-in in Metz territory.
Jeremy Stinat signals a free kick to Monaco in their own half.
Metz awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 10, Throw-in for Metz at Stade Saint Symphorien.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Jeremy Stinat awards Monaco a goal kick.
In the minute 16, In Metz a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Jeremy Stinat signals a Metz throw-in in Monaco's half.
In the minute 17, Can Metz get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Monaco's half?
Niko Kovac is making the team's first substitution at Stade Saint Symphorien with Sofiane Diop replacing Aleksandr Golovin.
Free kick Metz.
Jeremy Stinat awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 19, Free kick for Metz in the half of Monaco.
Ruben Aguilar (Monaco) has received a first yellow card.
Monaco have a goal kick.
In the minute 21, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Monaco close to the penalty box.
Benoit Badiashile puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
Throw-in for Monaco in the half of Metz.
In the minute 23, Jeremy Stinat signals a free kick to Metz.
Monaco awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 24, Throw-in Monaco.
At Stade Saint Symphorien, Youssouf Fofana has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In Metz a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Habib Maiga is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 27, Metz drives forward and Farid Boulaya gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Metz have been awarded a corner by Jeremy Stinat.
Habib Maiga for Metz is back on the field again.
In the minute 29, Corner awarded to Monaco.
Throw-in for Monaco close to the penalty box.
Free kick for Monaco in the half of Metz.
In the minute 30, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Monaco in their own half.
Free kick for Monaco in their own half.
In the minute 32, Ball safe as Metz is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Metz awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Metz get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Monaco's half?
In the minute 35, Jeremy Stinat awards the away team a throw-in.
Jeremy Stinat signals a free kick to Monaco.
Throw-in for Monaco at Stade Saint Symphorien.
In the minute 38, Metz have been awarded a corner by Jeremy Stinat.
Free kick Metz.
Goal kick for Monaco at Stade Saint Symphorien.
In the minute 39, Free kick for Monaco in their own half.
Aurelien Tchouameni gets his shot on target but fails to score for Monaco.
Jeremy Stinat signals a free kick to Metz in their own half.
In the minute 42, Gelson Martins (Monaco) has received a yellow card from Jeremy Stinat.
Corner awarded to Metz.
Monaco are pushing forward but Wissam Ben Yedder's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 45, Ball goes out of play for a Metz goal kick.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Free kick for Metz in the half of Monaco.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Metz.
The first-half is over.
The second half has started at Stade Saint Symphorien.
In the minute 46, Free kick Monaco.
Free kick for Metz in their own half.
Monaco's Youssouf Fofana has been shown a second yellow card and sent off.
In the minute 49, Jeremy Stinat signals a free kick to Metz.
Monaco's Aurelien Tchouameni has been booked in Metz.
In Metz Metz drive forward through Farid Boulaya. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 50, Metz have been awarded a corner by Jeremy Stinat.
Throw-in for Monaco in their own half.
Metz needs to be cautious. Monaco have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 53, Ball safe as Monaco is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Metz awarded a free kick in their own half.
Metz have been awarded a corner by Jeremy Stinat.
In the minute 54, Ibrahima Niane for Metz gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Metz.
In Metz a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 58, Metz's Ibrahima Niane misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Monaco at Stade Saint Symphorien.
Jean-Eudes Aholou is replacing Henry Onyekuru for the away team.
In the minute 59, The home team have replaced Victorien Angban with Habib Diallo. This is the first substitution made today by Vincent Hognon.
Corner awarded to Metz.
Metz's Fabien Centtonze gets in a shot on goal at Stade Saint Symphorien. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 60, Corner awarded to Metz.
Metz's Ibrahima Niane goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Metz have been awarded a corner by Jeremy Stinat.
In the minute 61, Habib Diallo of Metz gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Monaco goal kick.
Monaco have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 63, Jeremy Stinat awards Metz a goal kick.
Jeremy Stinat signals a free kick to Monaco in their own half.
Throw-in Metz.
In the minute 69, Free kick Monaco.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Metz.
Pape Ndiaga Yade is replacing Opa Nguette for Metz at Stade Saint Symphorien.
In the minute 70, Vincent Hognon (Metz) is making a third substitution, with Thierry Ambrose replacing Ibrahima Niane.
Metz to take a throw-in in Monaco territory.
Monaco awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 73, Metz have a goal kick.
Jeremy Stinat signals a Monaco throw-in in Metz's half.
Monaco are caught offside.
In the minute 76, Throw-in Metz.
Metz awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 76, The away team have replaced Gelson Martins with Willem Geubbels. This is the fifth substitution made today by Niko Kovac.
Guillermo Maripan is on a sub for Aurelien Tchouameni for Monaco.
Niko Kovac is making the team's fourth substitution at Stade Saint Symphorien with Stevan Jovetic replacing Wissam Ben Yedder.
Jeremy Stinat signals a free kick to Monaco in their own half.
In the minute 78, Metz have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Metz in the half of Monaco.
Metz make their fourth substitution with Cheikh Tidiane Sabaly replacing Farid Boulaya.
In the minute 80, Throw-in for Monaco in their own half.
Metz's Vincent Pajot is on target but unsuccessful.
Jeremy Stinat signals a throw-in for Metz, close to Monaco's area.
In the minute 82, Ball safe as Monaco is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in high up the field for Metz in Metz.
Free kick for Monaco in their own half.
In the minute 84, Monaco awarded a free kick in their own half.
Metz to take a throw-in in Monaco territory.
Jeremy Stinat signals a Metz throw-in in Monaco's half.
In the minute 86, It's a goal kick for the away team in Metz.
Can Metz capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Monaco's half?
Metz's Dylan Bronn misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 89, Jeremy Stinat awards Monaco a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Metz.
Goal kick for Monaco at Stade Saint Symphorien.
Throw-in for Metz at Stade Saint Symphorien.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Jeremy Stinat awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Metz in their own half.
Jeremy Stinat signals a free kick to Metz.
That's full-time at Stade Saint Symphorien. The final score is 0-1.
